title: 方块填充过多崩溃怎么办
author: AIMILIYA
txt_content:
撸建筑的时候，用worldedit的指令时手滑打错数字，然后存档没法进去了....一进去就跳出来回到启动器。有没有办法能解决？

以下是重启时窗口提示的：
The game crashed whilst unexpected error
Error: java.lang.StackOverflowError: Unexpected error



log文件里：

(BlockRedstoneComparator.java:237) ~[akc.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.world.World.func_147453_f(World.java:3875) ~[ahb.class:?]
        at net.minecraft.world.World.func_147455_a(World.java:2603) ~[ahb.class:?]
[13:03:16] [Server thread/INFO]: Stopping server
[13:03:16] [Server thread/INFO]: Saving players
[13:03:16] [Server thread/INFO]: Saving worlds
[13:03:16] [Server thread/INFO]: Saving chunks for level 'Carriot'/Overworld
[13:03:16] [Server thread/INFO]: Saving chunks for level 'Carriot'/Nether
[13:03:16] [Server thread/INFO]: Saving chunks for level 'Carriot'/The End
[13:03:16] [Server thread/INFO]: Unloading dimension 0
[13:03:16] [Server thread/INFO]: Unloading dimension -1
[13:03:16] [Server thread/INFO]: Unloading dimension 1
[13:03:16] [Server thread/INFO]: Applying holder lookups
[13:03:16] [Server thread/INFO]: Holder lookups applied
[13:03:17] [Client thread/INFO]: [net.minecraft.client.Minecraft:func_71377_b:349]: ---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Surprise! Haha. Well, this is awkward.

Time: 18-4-5 下午1:03
Description: Unexpected error

java.lang.StackOverflowError: Unexpected error
        at net.minecraft.block.Block.isNormalCube(Block.java:1209)
        at net.minecraft.block.Block.isSideSolid(Block.java:1251)
        at net.minecraft.world.World.func_147466_a(World.java:2627)
        at net.minecraft.block.BlockRedstoneDiode.func_149718_j(SourceFile:39)
        at net.minecraft.block.BlockRedstoneDiode.func_149695_a(SourceFile:124)
        at net.minecraft.block.BlockRedstoneComparator.onNeighborChange(BlockRedstoneComparator.java:237)
        at net.minecraft.world.World.func_147453_f(World.java:3875)
        at net.minecraft.world.World.func_147455_a(World.java:2603)


……
真的不想放弃存档啊，撸了好久的建筑..下次再也不手滑了...
